# Drips App: The easiest way to fund Open Source in your Ecosystem

<a href="https://drips.network/app/projects/github/drips-network/app" target="_blank"><img src="https://drips.network/api/embed/project/https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fdrips-network%2Fapp/support.png?background=white&style=github&text=us&stat=dependencies" alt="Support app on drips.network" height="20"></a>
[![DeepWiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/DeepWiki-drips--network%2Fapp-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://deepwiki.com/drips-network/app)
<!-- DeepWiki badge generated by https://deepwiki.ryoppippi.com/ -->

Drips üíß is a protocol (and app), built on Ethereum, that enables organizations and individuals to directly and publicly provide funding to the free and open source software projects they depend on the most. Learn more on our [website](https://drips.network) (which is this repo)!

## ‚ú® Feature overview

- Fund any open-source repository on GitHub using any ERC-20 token
- Make one-time or continuous donations in the form of streams with per-second settlement
- As a project maintainer, automatically forward a set percentage of funds to your software dependencies
- Create Drip Lists, which allow funding a large amount of software projects or Ethereum addresses with a single transaction
- Run a RetroPGF round end-to-end, from intake to distribution
- ...and much more

## üí¶ Development

Find instructions for running the app locally in the [Development Guide](/docs/DEVELOPMENT.md).

## üìù Submitting feedback

Please first search this repo if your issue already exists. If so, feel free to comment. If not, create an issue with your feedback and tag it `bug` (for things that aren‚Äôt working right) or `enhancement` (for feature ideas, or improvements for existing features).

If you‚Äôre suggesting copy changes, please create a single issue for all your suggestions and ideally group them sensibly (by page, section, flow, etc.)

If your feedback is about the landing page, please also tag it with `landing page`.

You can also reach out to us on our [Discord](https://discord.gg/t8XBXZAEs5), we're always there.

Thank you for your feedback! ‚úåÔ∏è
